title: Wesley Chu - Time Siege (Time Salvager #2)
description:
Having been haunted by the past and enslaved by the present, James Griffin-Mars is taking control of the future.

Earth is a toxic, sparsely inhabited wastelandÂ­Â­the perfect hiding place for a fugitive exÂ­chronman to hide from the authorities.

James has allies, scientists he rescued from previous centuries: Elise Kim, who believes she can renew Earth, given timeÍ¾ Grace Priestly, the venerated inventor of time travel herselfÍ¾ Levin, James's mentor and former pursuer, now disgracedÍ¾ and the Elfreth, a population of downtrodden humans who want desperately to believe that James and his friends will heal their ailing home world.

James also has enemies. They include the full military might of benighted solar system ruled by corporate greed and a desperate fear of what James will do next. At the forefront of their efforts to stop him is Kuo, the ruthless security head, who wants James's head on a pike and will stop at nothing to obtain it.





Read by Kevin T. Collins
Format: MP3
